force.name: force
force.description: Will run deployment in force mode. Can be dangerous.

project.name: project
project.description: Shorthand identifier for your Twilio project.

functions-env.name: functions-env

project-name.description: Overrides the name of the project. Default: the name field in your package.json

account-sid.description: A specific account SID to be used for deployment. Uses fields in .env otherwise

auth-token.name: auth-token
auth-token.description: Use a specific auth token for deployment. Uses fields from .env otherwise

env.name: env
env.description: Path to .env file. If none, the local .env in the current working directory is used.

override-existing-project.description: Deploys project to existing service if a naming conflict has been found.

force.name: force
force.description: Will run deployment in force mode. Can be dangerous.

project.name: project
project.description: Shorthand identifier for your Twilio project.

project.description: Shorthand identifier for your Twilio project.

args.description: Name of Serverless project and directory that will be created

properties.name: properties

extended-output.description: Show an extended set of properties on the output

account-sid.description: A specific account SID to be used for deployment. Uses fields in .env otherwise

project.description: Shorthand identifier for your Twilio project.

args.name: types
args.description: Comma seperated list of things to list (services,environments,functions,assets,variables)

list.description: List available templates. Will [1mnot[22m create a new function

args.description: Name for the function to be created

env.name: env

detailed-logs.description: Toggles detailed request logging by showing request body and query params

live.name: live
live.description: Always serve from the current functions (no caching)

inspect-brk.description: Enables Node.js debugging protocol, stops executioin until debugger is attached
